definition: to rule/to govern/to manage/to control/to harness (a river)/to treat (a disease)/to wipe out (a pest)/to punish/to research

sentences.english: The meal was out of this world.
My mom thinks I'm absolutely nuts.
sentences.chinese: 我妈以为我的确没治了。

sentences.english: Couple this with a great pen and life really doesn’t get much better!
sentences.chinese: 要是再配上一只绝赞的笔，生活就没治了。

sentences.english: If poison of this kind gets into your system, you' ve had it.
sentences.chinese: 如果这种毒药进入你体内，你就没治了。

sentences.english: There is no cure for my pimples.

definition: to fall ill/to contract a disease
to die of illness or injury despite receiving medical help
see 無可救藥|无可救药[wu2 ke3 jiu4 yao4]
(proverb) a long illness makes the patient into a doctor
to recover spontaneously (from an illness)/to get better without medical treatment
to recur (of a disease)/to reappear/to relapse (into a former bad state)
to seek medical treatment/to see a doctor
hiding a sickness for fear of treatment (idiom); fig. concealing a fault to avoid criticism/to keep one's shortcomings secret/to refuse to listen to advice
